00060 const DeformingDomainWrapper::MeshCharacteristic DEFAULT_METRIC_TYPE = 
00061   DeformingDomainWrapper::SHAPE;
00062 
00063 const bool DEFAULT_CULLING = true;
00064 const double DEFAULT_CPU_TIME = 0.0;
00065 const double DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_FACTOR = 0.01;
00066 const int DEFAULT_INNER_ITERATIONS = 2;
00067 const char DEFAULT_CURVE_TAG[] = "MesquiteCurveFraction";
00068 const DeformingCurveSmoother::Scheme DEFAULT_CURVE_TYPE = 
00069   DeformingCurveSmoother::PROPORTIONAL;
00070 
00071 DeformingDomainWrapper::DeformingDomainWrapper()
00072   : metricType( DEFAULT_METRIC_TYPE ),
00073     initVertexCoords(""),
00074     doCulling(DEFAULT_CULLING),
00075     cpuTime(DEFAULT_CPU_TIME),
00076     movementFactor(DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_FACTOR)
00077   {}
00078 
00079 DeformingDomainWrapper::~DeformingDomainWrapper() {}
00080 
00081 void DeformingDomainWrapper::store_initial_mesh( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00082 {
00083   TagVertexMesh tool( err, mesh, false, initVertexCoords ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00084   InstructionQueue q;
00085   q.add_tag_vertex_mesh( &tool, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00086   q.run_instructions( mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00087   if (initVertexCoords.empty())
00088     initVertexCoords = tool.get_tag_name();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void DeformingDomainWrapper::set_vertex_movement_limit_factor( double f )
00092 {
00093   assert(f > 0.0);
00094   movementFactor = f;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void DeformingDomainWrapper::run_wrapper( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00098                                           ParallelMesh* pmesh,
00099                                           Settings* settings,
00100                                           QualityAssessor* qa,
00101                                           MsqError& err )
00102 {
00103   if (movementFactor <= 0) {
00104     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_STATE,
00105       "Optimization will not terminate with non-positive movement factor %f",
00106       movementFactor);
00107     return;
00108   }
00109 
00110   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00111   MeshDomain* geom = mesh_and_domain->get_domain();
00112 
00113     // Move initial mesh to domain in case caller did not
00114   move_to_domain( mesh, geom, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00115 
00116   const double P = 1.0;
00117   TagVertexMesh init_mesh( err, mesh ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00118   ReferenceMesh ref_mesh( &init_mesh );
00119   RefMeshTargetCalculator W( &ref_mesh );
00120   
00121   TShapeNB1 mu_s;
00122   TShapeSize2DNB1 mu_2d_ss;
00123   TShapeSize3DNB1 mu_3d_ss;
00124   TMixed mu_ss( &mu_2d_ss, &mu_3d_ss );
00125   TShapeSizeOrientNB1 mu_sso;
00126   TMetric* mu = 0;
00127   switch (metricType) {
00128     case SHAPE:             mu = &mu_s  ; break;
00129     case SHAPE_SIZE:        mu = &mu_ss ; break;
00130     case SHAPE_SIZE_ORIENT: mu = &mu_sso; break;
00131   }
00132 
00133   TQualityMetric sample_metric( &W, mu );
00134   ElementPMeanP elem_metric( P, &sample_metric );
00135   PMeanPTemplate obj_func( P, &elem_metric );
00136   
00137   TerminationCriterion inner, outer;
00138   SteepestDescent improver( &obj_func );
00139   improver.use_element_on_vertex_patch(); // Nash optimization
00140   inner.add_iteration_limit( DEFAULT_INNER_ITERATIONS );
00141   if (doCulling)
00142     inner.cull_on_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( movementFactor );
00143   else
00144     outer.add_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( movementFactor );
00145   if (cpuTime > 0.0)
00146     outer.add_cpu_time( cpuTime );
00147   improver.set_inner_termination_criterion( &inner );
00148   improver.set_outer_termination_criterion( &outer );
00149   
00150   qa->add_quality_assessment(&elem_metric);
00151   InstructionQueue q;
00152   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00153   q.set_master_quality_improver( &improver, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00154   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00155   q.run_common( mesh_and_domain, pmesh, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00156 }
00157 
00158 void DeformingDomainWrapper::move_to_domain( Mesh* mesh, 
00159                                              MeshDomain* geom, 
00160                                              MsqError& err )
00161 {
00162   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts;
00163   mesh->get_all_vertices( verts, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00164   
00165   MsqVertex coords;
00166   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::const_iterator i;
00167   for (i = verts.begin(); i != verts.end(); ++i) {
00168     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( &*i, &coords, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00169     geom->snap_to( *i, coords );
00170     mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( *i, coords, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00171   }
00172 }

00174 DeformingCurveSmoother::DeformingCurveSmoother()
00175   : metricType(DEFAULT_CURVE_TYPE), initFractTag(DEFAULT_CURVE_TAG)
00176   {}
00177 
00178 DeformingCurveSmoother::~DeformingCurveSmoother()
00179   {}
00180 
00181 void DeformingCurveSmoother::store_initial_mesh( Mesh* mesh,
00182                                                  const Mesh::VertexHandle* verts,
00183                                                  int nverts,
00184                                                  CurveDomain* geom,
00185                                                  MsqError& err )
00186 {
00187   if (nverts < 2) {
00188     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid curve mesh.  Need at least two end vertices.",
00189                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00190     return;
00191   }
00192 
00193   // get edge lengths
00194   std::vector<double> vals(nverts - 1);
00195   MsqVertex coords[2];
00196   int prev = 0;
00197   mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( verts, coords+prev, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00198   for (int i = 1; i < nverts; ++i) {
00199     int next = 1 - prev;
00200     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( verts+i, coords+next, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00201     vals[i-1] = (coords[0] - coords[1]).length();
00202     prev = next;
00203   }
00204   
00205   // convert to length fraction before each iterior vertex
00206   // (sum of lengths of adjacent edges over total curve length)
00207   const double total = std::accumulate( vals.begin(), vals.end(), 0.0 );
00208   for (int i = 1; i < nverts-1; ++i)
00209     vals[i-1] = vals[i-1]/total;
00210   vals.resize(nverts-2);
00211   
00212   // create tag
00213   TagHandle tag = mesh->tag_create( initFractTag, Mesh::DOUBLE, 1, 0, err );
00214   if (err.error_code() == MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS) {
00215     err.clear();
00216     tag = get_tag( mesh, err ); 
00217   }
00218   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00219   
00220   // store tag data on interior vertices
00221   mesh->tag_set_vertex_data( tag, nverts-2, verts+1, &vals[0], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00222 }
00223 
00224 void DeformingCurveSmoother::smooth_curve( Mesh* mesh,
00225                                            const Mesh::VertexHandle* verts,
00226                                            int nverts,
00227                                            CurveDomain* geom,
00228                                            Scheme type,
00229                                            MsqError& err )
00230 {
00231   if (nverts < 2) {
00232     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid curve mesh.  Need at least two end vertices.",
00233                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00234     return;
00235   }
00236 
00237   // Verify that end vertices are on curve.  We cannot snap end vertices
00238   // to ends of curve for application because we don't know where the
00239   // ends of the curve are.
00240   MsqVertex coords[2], coords2;
00241   Mesh::VertexHandle ends[2] = { verts[0], verts[nverts-1] };
00242   for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
00243     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( ends+i, coords+i, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00244     geom->position_from_length( coords[i].to_array(), 0, coords2.to_array(), err );
00245     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00246     if ((coords[i] - coords2).length_squared() > DBL_EPSILON) {
00247       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Curve end vertices do not line on curve.  Move ends to curve end points first",
00248                       MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00249       return;
00250     }
00251   }
00252   const double total = geom->arc_length( coords[0].to_array(), coords[1].to_array(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00253   
00254   std::vector<double> vals(nverts-1);
00255   if (metricType == EQUAL) {
00256     std::fill( vals.begin(), vals.end(), 1.0/(nverts-1) );
00257     //fracsum = 1.0;
00258   }
00259   else { // metricType == PROPORTIONAL
00260     TagHandle tag = get_tag( mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00261     mesh->tag_get_vertex_data( tag, nverts-2, verts+1, &vals[0], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00262     double sum = std::accumulate( vals.begin(), vals.end()-1, 0.0 ); 
00263     if (1.0 - sum > 1e-8)
00264       vals.back() = 1.0 - sum;
00265     else {
00266       vals.back() = *std::min_element( vals.begin(), vals.end()-1 );
00267       sum += vals.back();
00268       for (size_t i = 0; i < vals.size(); ++i)
00269         vals[i] /= sum;
00270     }
00271   }
00272   
00273   double frac_sum = 0.0;
00274   for (int i = 1; i < nverts-1; ++i) {
00275     frac_sum += vals[i-1];
00276     geom->position_from_length( coords[0].to_array(), total * frac_sum, coords[1].to_array(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00277     mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( verts[i], coords[1], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00278   }
00279 }
00280 
00281 TagHandle DeformingCurveSmoother::get_tag( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00282 {
00283   TagHandle h = mesh->tag_get( initFractTag, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00284   std::string name;
00285   Mesh::TagType type;
00286   unsigned len;
00287   mesh->tag_properties( h, name, type, len, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00288   if (type != Mesh::DOUBLE || len != 1) {
00289     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_MESH,
00290                     "Tag \"%s\" exists but is not 1 double value per vertex.",
00291                     initFractTag.c_str());
00292   }
00293   return h;
00294 }
